headline: What Packaging Corporation of America (PKG)'s Earnings Miss and Cautious Outlook Mean for Shareholders
summary: Packaging Corporation of America recently reported third-quarter 2025 financial results, with sales rising to US$2,313.4 million and GAAP earnings of US$2.51 per share, while also issuing fourth-quarter earnings guidance of US$2.40 per share, both of which came in below analyst expectations. Despite setting records in operational cash flow and integrating a major acquisition, the company's earnings miss and cautious near-term outlook raised concerns about profit momentum amid ongoing...
